timeline.message:
Enable json output when pattern is specified on the command line with
'-e' or 'f', and the '-json' flag is set.
Json output is now pretty-printed.
Fixes https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep/issues/1469

timeline.message:
Imply '-json' when passing a rules file to semgrep-core for backward
compatibility. Also, we don't support text output in this mode anyway.

Don't pretty-print json output because it kills performance
significantly (not sure why, possibly due to some very
long json strings in the benchmarks)
